title: Moon's Familiar

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Days other than Day 1 are night as well as day.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - The next day becomes night and not day, and you may deal a Basic attack during it. Activate only with the Necromonicon.

desc:
Post 302
*The night is when the infinite expanse of the stars shines through the blinding sun. Why not see it forevermore?*
